purpose: Framework for prioritizing resources across multiple early-stage projects

principles: Maintain minimum viable progress across portfolio
Adjust allocation based on validation milestones
Leverage AI augmentation to maximize team impact
Maintain strategic optionality while driving key priorities

resourceCategories.description: Allocation of team member time and focus
resourceCategories.minimumThreshold: At least one team member with 10% time allocation per active project

resourceCategories.allocationApproach: Core budget plus milestone-based additional funding
resourceCategories.minimumThreshold: Maintenance budget for all projects, growth budget for prioritized projects

resourceCategories.allocationApproach: Shared core infrastructure with project-specific additions
resourceCategories.minimumThreshold: Basic technical needs met for all projects

resourceCategories.allocationApproach: Strategic partnerships aligned with priority verticals
resourceCategories.minimumThreshold: Minimum viable partner ecosystem for each vertical

dimensions.scoringScale: 1-5 scale, where 5 represents highest strategic value
1-5 scale, where 5 represents strongest market validation
1-5 scale, where 5 represents strongest execution momentum
1-5 scale, where 5 represents highest resource efficiency

tiers.description: Projects receiving significant resources for rapid advancement
tiers.criteria: Top 20% of projects by weighted score

typicalAllocation.focus: Rapid advancement toward market validation and scaling

tiers.description: Projects receiving moderate resources for steady progress
tiers.criteria: Next 30% of projects by weighted score

typicalAllocation.focus: Consistent progress toward key validation milestones

tiers.description: Projects receiving minimal resources to maintain progress
tiers.criteria: Next 30% of projects by weighted score

typicalAllocation.focus: Maintaining momentum and pursuing low-cost validation activities

tiers.description: Projects under evaluation for continuation or pivoting
tiers.criteria: Bottom 20% of projects by weighted score

typicalAllocation.focus: Critical evaluation of potential, pivot opportunities, or sunsetting

process: Update project scores across all dimensions
Adjust resource allocations based on tier and specific needs
reviewCycle.exceptions: Critical developments may trigger immediate review outside normal cycle
